Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.catalog

Class CourseCatalog

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.catalog.CourseCatalog
public class CourseCatalog extends Object
Represents a course catalog for PackScheduler
Author:
Ken Ogura, Alex Jong, Zachary Orr

  • Method Details

    • newCourseCatalog

      public void newCourseCatalog()
      Constructs an empty catalog

    • loadCoursesFromFile

      public void loadCoursesFromFile(String fileName)
      Loads courses from a file into catalog.
      Parameters:
      fileName - String representing a filename that courses will be loaded from
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the file cannot be found

    • addCourseToCatalog

      public boolean addCourseToCatalog(String name, String title, String section, int credits, String instructorId, int enrollmentCap, String meetingDays, int startTime, int endTime)
      Adds a course to the course catalog.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the course
      title - title of the course
      section - section of the course
      credits - credit number of the course
      instructorId - instructor id of the instructor for the course
      enrollmentCap - enrollment capacity of the course
      meetingDays - the meeting days of the course
      startTime - the start time of the course
      endTime - the end time of the course
      Returns:
      true if the passed in course details are already in catalog and false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the String parameters are null or invalid
      IllegalArgumentException - if meeting days is invalid
      IllegalArgumentException - if times is invalid

    • removeCourseFromCatalog

      public boolean removeCourseFromCatalog(String name, String section)
      Removes a course from the course catalog
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the course
      section - the section of the course
      Returns:
      true if a course is in the catalog and false otherwise

    • getCourseFromCatalog

      public Course getCourseFromCatalog(String name, String section)
      Gets a course from the course catalog
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the course to be retrieved
      section - the section of the course to be retrieved
      Returns:
      course if it is present in catalog and returns null otherwise

    • getCourseCatalog

      public String[][] getCourseCatalog()
      Gets the entire course catalog with information about course names, sections, and titles.
      Returns:
      courseCatalog a 2d array that contains courses in catalog and course name, section, and title.

    • saveCourseCatalog

      public void saveCourseCatalog(String filename)
      Saves the course catalog to a given file.
      Parameters:
      filename - the file where the course catalog will be saved
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if unable to save file
